attributes.action: Increase the pay received by Police Officers, in line with the pay increase received by fire fighters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Police officers face an ever increasing risk of assault, or worse. I ask that pay be increased to relect the unique risks incurred by police officers. More and more officers are considering leaving the service, through low pay rates, compared to increasing risks and reducing job satisfaction.. we face a severe shortage of officers in time. The Prime Minister can act to attract and retain officers..
